thread.title_full: HORRIBLE! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! - Review of Hotel Standard Design, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: georgiosk18
title: HORRIBLE! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
text: The room was not clean and very small ! The bathroom was small with broken furniture with few products of healthy! They didn t have fridge in the room! As for breakfast one will tell they leave us from one marmelade per person, general was very poor! I will not recomment it to anyone ! ! !
